name: Dice Run (Simone Guggiari)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • WASD/QE: MOVE
  • SPACE: ROLL DICE
  • LEFT SHIFT: BOOST

OBJECTIVE:

  • GO THROUGH THE RED CIRCLED NUMBERS WHILE YOUR DICE SHOWS THE CORRECT NUMBER TO SCORE POINTS.
  • AVOID COLLIDING AND RE-ROLL YOUR DICE BEFORE THE TIMER RUNS OUT TO AVOID EXPLODING.
  • SCORE THE HIGHEST AMOUNT OF POINTS AND BE ADDED TO THE GLOBAL HALL OF FAME.
